title: MOST TOXIC PERSON EVER

embed.description: This is on the forums in OCE

body: This person ....  SOOOOOO TOXIC. flamed me for attacking cs because my support item gives us both gold and xp and cs. He then continues to flame even more. After that he then continued to say  "thresh you autistic fuck" all chat this time "report thresh toxic" although I hadn't said anything toxic in the slightest. After a long of being told to be reported and flamed the one who who said it. He then private messaged me saying exactly what's on the link I had added then said I was fussy, I was toxic and to report me for "trolling" how was I trolling? How was I toxic? ask before he is banned because I need to know what keeps these people coming!

replies.body: couldn't you just have printscreen'd the chatlog??
I got a chat ban, it's just wow...
he was probably just tilted and he might not have played since the support item update
